doc:
Wallace Ford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wallace_Ford 0 Wallace Ford (born Samuel Jones Grundy, 12 February 1898 – 11 June 1966) was an English-born naturalized American vaudevillian, stage, film and television actor. Usually playing wise-cracking characters, he combined a tough but friendly faced demeanor with a small but powerful stocky physique. Wallace_Ford ( born Samuel_Jones_Grundy , 12_February_1898 – 11_June_1966 ) was an_English-born_naturalized_American_vaudevillian , stage , film_and_television_actor . Usually playing wise-cracking_characters , he combined a_tough_but_friendly_faced_demeanor with a_small_but_powerful_stocky_physique .
